= NCBI BLAST  =

http://www.ebi.ac.uk/Tools/webservices/services/ncbiblast

= How to use NCBI BLAST through the Biological Web Services Proxy =

In order to use the service the following [http://code.google.com/p/bwsproxy/wiki/parameters Proxy parameters] are requiered.

Aditional parameters specific for this service are:

 * *async* (Default:  false)
 * *progam* (Default: blastn)
 * *database* (Default: embl)
 * *sequence* (required)

These parameters can be submited by GET or POST. 
 
== Examples ==

http://bwsp.bioinfo.cnio.es/bwsp.php?bwsp_service=ebiNcbiblast&bwsp_response_format=raw&bwsp_url=http://www.ebi.ac.uk/Tools/services/rest/ncbiblast/run/?email=vdelatorre@cnio.es,program=blastn,database=em_rel_syn,stype=dna,
